room_title: Escape room "The Composer" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: We did the Composer room this past Saturday night and overall our group had a fun time! This is the second time that I have been to this location and now that I've done two rooms I feel like I can give a review. I think recommending less people (our party had seven) would be a good idea. This room is smaller in space so there's just not enough for seven people to participate effectively. Also, there were couple activities/puzzles in this specific room that we had to do the same thing a couple times bc they "stick" or malfunction.

room_title: Escape room "The Composer" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: Our Youth Group earned their trip to Escape Chambers and had a blast. We had enough people to break out for the Recruit and the Composer. Both groups were pleased with the story-line, clues, and hints.

room_title: Escape room "The Composer" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: Our group (8 people) did the Composer. 8 people might have been too many, but the room was not easy! We completed using all three hints and escaped with five minutes left on the clock.
